title: frumstalking
author: frumstalking
content: Looking to buy any crypto wallets / exchange accounts, NFT wallets, DEX accounts.Needs to have good profit trading, appreciation history!

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: you should put a price for it just like the first who had tried in this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440895.0 maybe someone will be interested. can you now tell us what is it for?  because it already is interesting to see two of you are looking to buy old ETH wallets. i have mine very unused since 2018 which was created from ForkDelta how much are you offering for it?i still kept the oldest ones that i have as i have a spreadsheet for the wallets i created. maybe if the price is good enough to ignore the risk, i wouldn't mind selling those old throw-away wallets.

comments.author: frumstalking
comments.body: Quote from: electronicash on November 12, 2023, 03:54:11 PMyou should put a price for it just like the first who had tried in this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5440895.0 maybe someone will be interested. can you now tell us what is it for?  because it already is interesting to see two of you are looking to buy old ETH wallets. i have mine very unused since 2018 which was created from ForkDelta how much are you offering for it?i still kept the oldest ones that i have as i have a spreadsheet for the wallets i created. maybe if the price is good enough to ignore the risk, i wouldn't mind selling those old throw-away wallets. 1. I am offering from $50 - $1000 depending on the details.2. Reason to buy these items is to have transaction / trading / appreciation history that is separate from one's own wallets or accounts just in case. Such bought histories can become handy without having to leak your own transaction history which in many cases lead to a cold wallet (main wallet). You can CoinJoin to spend from cold wallet which everyone should do but in certain cases some people may not want to leak how many x profit they have made and keep cold wallet as their own private intel.3. I am not only looking for ETH wallets.You could send me more details about the ForkDelta wallet.

comments.author: Btcspot
comments.body: Hi how much you pay for some old bitcoin 2016 or old wallet with transactions? I have priv. key.

comments.author: frumstalking
comments.body: Quote from: Btcspot on November 12, 2023, 08:08:32 PM Hi how much you pay for some old bitcoin 2016 or old wallet with transactions? I have priv. key.You can pm me with more detail about the wallet.

comments.author: dinozzo28
comments.body: Hello, I have bitpay acc for sale.dinozzo28@yahoo.com https://t.me/mark288228

I cannot pm more than 2 messages a day.. Could you send your telegram if you use one.
